item.title: Powerful earthquake strikes near the east coast of Russia’s Kamchatka region
item.description: A powerful 7.4 magnitude earthquake has struck near the east coast of Russia’s Kamchatka region

item.title: Erika Kirk delivers remarks to the nation after killing of husband Charlie Kirk
item.description: Just days after a gunman shot and killed Charlie Kirk at a Utah university, his wife, Erika, delivered her first public remarks on Friday night.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: How Charlie Kirk's influence with younger voters helped Donald Trump: ANALYSIS
item.description: "Both young men and young women moved to the right dramatically," he said.

item.title: WATCH: Utah governor says suspect in killing of Charlie Kirk is in custody
item.description: NEW: A suspect has been arrested in the fatal shooting of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, officials announced.
